certifications.name: Responsive Web Design
certifications.lucasNotes: The creative foundation for beautiful, adaptive user interfaces ‚Äî this very portfolio is a living example.

certifications.lucasNotes: Powers dynamic, engaging, and interactive web experiences.

certifications.harperNotes: Official certification of production-ready frontend tooling proficiency.

certifications.name: Data Visualization

certifications.harperNotes: Verifiable skills in turning data into insight.

certifications.name: Back End Development and APIs

certifications.benjaminNotes: Server architecture, routing, middleware, authentication patterns.

certifications.name: Information Security and Quality Assurance
certifications.lucasNotes: Security and testing make great experiences trustworthy.

certifications.name: Scientific Computing with Python

certifications.lucasNotes: The future of intelligent, adaptive user experiences.

notes.effortSummary: 3,600+ conservative hours from legacy certifications alone + substantial new curriculum progress. All links active and publicly verifiable as of February 2026.
notes.curriculumNote: freeCodeCamp transition ongoing ‚Äî all available new curriculum sections completed.
